content: this hat was designed during a very tough time for me and my family and it was knit with you all in my mind during this time we have had such a huge amount of support and love from all of you i really wanted to do something to give a little back and show you all just how much it has meant to us i named this the angel hat because you are all angels to us the hat is knit in an aran weight yarn but would work equally as well in a worsted weight it is sized to fit most adult heads with just a little bit of slouch - my favourite it has a simple textured pattern that works for both men and women and it a fun quick knit i hope you enjoy it kay x
